item.title: Horse Chestnut tree branch in urgent need of removal, 8th September
item.description:
Horse Chestnut tree on triangle of grass at the junction of Stockwell Lane and New Road, what3words forest.mock.branch. An arboriculturalist has advised me that, for public safety, the lowest branch needs to be removed within a month. The tree is in the Woodmancote Conservation Area and is the symbol of Woodmancote Village.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
